title: New Support Character concept: Moelock the Poacher of Scum

replies.body: 2 thoughts; first of all the bait thing seems little OP, 3 second cc is a little too much, I think 1.5-2 seconds would be best considering the rest of though I prefur the half time orange a lot more, his E they should only be immune to cc and disables imo

Cheers for the feed back, made some alterations to the character. 

The "Bushman's" rifle:

"Bush" shot: Perfect for dealing with crowds, these 8 gauge rounds unleashes a furious burst of rubber buckshot ,spraying 3 large pellets towards enemies (caught within a cone radius damage zone). Having a constant barrage of Bush shot savagely bashing against their flesh, victim find themselves stumbling and dazed (minions are stunned for 2 seconds upon initial impact, while enemies champions are slowed down for 3
seconds after two full volley direct shots) . Designed to disarm and weaken prey rather than completely subdue, Bush shot can exhaust targets (It is able to eat away at enemy champion's Health points), however it will never be capable of killing ( It will be able to slay minions, but once enemy champions reach 20 point of health, Moelock's Bush shot will be incapable of dealing anymore damage).
"Wallop" shot: A brutal 12 gauge rubber slug, this round was designed to render it's prey unconscious when shot with it. Having double the range of it's cousin shell and capable of greater accuracy, Wallop rounds are ideal for catching prey and sending them into a pain induced nightmare as Moelock drags them to the nearest "Locker house". Bashing into it's victim upon impact, it leaves enemies disoriented (minions are stunned upon impact for 2 Seconds, Champions are slowed for 1.5 seconds on the first shot ), allowing the hunter to catch up or deal more damaging blows with ease. Though this is not the only advantage of Moelock's "Wallop" Round, as the Infamous poach cleverly embedded a unique scent onto each rubber slug bullet, which splashes onto target when hit, allowing Talos to keep a "scent" of target should they decide to flee out of sight (Passive- "Poacher's trick"- enemy champions hit with "Wallop" shots will remain visible to Molelock and allies in the fog of war for 10 seconds). It should be noted , that due to the heavy calibre of the bullet , more pore is required to fire this kind of shell, which puts slightly more strain on the rifle's lever action, taking more time to reload between shots (taking 0.30 seconds to load a new shell each pull of the trigger).

Changes to Kit

E-Rescue Dog:

Seeing an teammate in a dire situation, whether it be them surrounded by minions and enemy champions or critical low on health in the middle of a battlefield, Moelock his able to "mark" them and let out a deafening whistle, causing his Talos to rush forward and grab a hold of the endangered teammate, quickly dragging to a safe distance (either behind Moelock or out of the enemies reach). Once Talos takes a grip onto her extraction target, the allied champion become immune to damage for 5 seconds as they are being dragged to safety, however, as a cost for this helpful spell, all damage dealt on the allied champion transfers directly onto Moelock. Should Moelock's "threshold for pain" be beaten (his health 0) be broken, the rescue will immedatly be halted as Talos will desperately run beside her fallen master, though for his sacrifice the ally he attempted to save will receive a small fraction of health (50p) to give them a small, put fighting chance.

R-Bushman's last stand:

When all hope his lost, Moelock still won't go down without a fight...or quietly. Should things turn for the worst for Moelock and his allies, he will must up all the rage he has buried under that upbeat grin throughout all his years of wondering and unleash a deafening war cry which "radiates" the area (forming a large radius of "Bush" aura). Pounding his chest with a courageous insanity, Moelock will lock his feet into the ground, wield his rifle in one had while drawing a rusty revolver in the other, Barraging the attacking enemy with insults as he blast them with a stream of rubbers bullets, allowing all allied champions to flee safely while he stay behind to die in their place. (All Enemy champions will trapped inside the highlighted circle, while all friendly champions are launched backwards to safety). No damage will occur to allied champions, as all attacks are immedatly drawn and inflicted to Moelock within the "bush aura" circle. Despite firing like a mad man and inflicting 50% less damage, Moelock is unable to kill any enemy champion trapped inside his "aura" . Lasting for 10 seconds, Moelock's last stand ensure allied escape at the expense of Moelock's demise, to compensate for this enemy champions will receive only half of the experience and gold upon slaying him.

New Speech:

-"Ouch! ARGH! URF! Bloody hell! Why would anyone do that!?" (when receiving damage from E-rescue dog)
-"..Can't we just play nice mates?" (when receiving damage from E-rescue dog)
-(covering pained grunts with a forced laugh) "hahaha, I do like it...(forces bark:) rough!" (when receiving damage from E-rescue dog)
-"AHH ME BLOODY KNACKERS!" (when receiving damage from E-rescue dog)
-"Your gonna buy me a slab for that one mate" (After a successful E-Rescue dog for Male champions)
-"...(puts on voice:) 'Thanks mate'....No worries mate! (voice:) your the best mate!....naaw cheers!" (After a successful E-Rescue dog for Female champions)
-"So... I know this an't the time sheila...but, Drinks after?" (After a successful E-Rescue dog for special females champions)
-"Fuuwa Mate! that was close." (After a successful E-Rescue dog for special male champions)
-"Kawr! Almost went down the Dunny there mate!" (After a successful E-Rescue dog for Monster champions)

-"COME FOR IT YA MONGRALS!" (Activating R-Bushman's last stand)
-"GO! GO! I GOT THIS YA DULL BASTARDS!" (Activating R-Bushman's last stand)
-"OFF THE ROCKER AND ON THE SCRAP! DO YOUR WORSE MATES!" (Activating R-Bushman's last stand)
-"AVIAAA MARIAAAA!" (Sings strand while in R-Bushman's last stand mode)
-"CRY EUREKA! 'CAUSE I'M NOT BACKING DOWN!" (roars in fury while in R-Bushman's last stand mode)
-"NOT THIS TIME YA MONGRALS! NEVER AGAIN!" (roars whole in in R-bushman's last stand mode)
-"WHEN I WAS A YOUNG LAD! I CARRIED ME PACK! AND I'LL BEAT ALL YOUR TEETH RIGHT OUT YA! (roars whole in in R-bushman's last stand mode)
-"...and the band plays waltzing Miranda..." (chuckles as he collapses from dying due to or right after R-Busman's last stand)
-"..Well...there you go mates..." (chuckles as he collapses from dying due to or right after R-Busman's last stand)
-"Chip sha...and...(last breath fading) shove off..." (chuckles as he collapses from dying due to or right after R-Busman's last stand)
-"...bloody knacked mates...Ta..." (chuckles as he collapses from dying due to or right after R-Busman's last stand)

Taunts/jokes:

Joke: Moelock halts, relaxes his fighting stance rest his rifle over his gun shoulder an lifts his hat in respect toward the taunted foe befor giving a wink and returning back into focus.

-"Hows it going sheila?" (female champions)
-"No hard feelings mate."
-"Two blokes walk into a pub, and....crap...bloody forgot the joke!"

SKINS:

Rouge Witch hunter Moelock: Moelock trades in his usual gear for a battle damaged set of black "witch hunting robes" and a black pilgrim which has various broken wands and magical trinkets decorating the hat's crown belt. Hie hair is longer and white, while his Pale eye now glows with a haunting orange aura and a three claw scares run diagonal across his face. Moelock also shaves off his sibe burns to have a thin goatee with a light stubble beard. Talos his converted into a demonic Rottweiler like hound with a deformed under bite, a silver spiked collar and glowing orange aura eyes. Moelock also trades in his "bushman's" rifle for an elaborately engraved steel Repeating crossbow.

(images references: robes and hat - , Talos- https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/fb/38/f8/fb38f84ae074d646d310a7310ac5265e.jpg )

Backyard Moelock/ Snag Master Moelock: Moelock wears a white singlet, blue board shorts, thogs (flip-flops), a cork hat and a line of zinc painted over his nose. With out the armour or usual gear, all of Moelock's scares are visible, while his paled eye is changed to a a permanently closed eye. The poacher's rilfe has been trades into for a home made "toy rifle" (made from some rope, a cricket bat and has a barbecue fork with a cooked Sausage for a bayonet). Talos Is traded into for a Cattle dog.

(references: Cork Hat- , Talos- ,repeating crossbow- )

Winter Mercenary Comrade Moelock; Moelock trades in his usual gear for a heavy winter army trench coat, thick snow boots, brown red leather combat webbing, an Ushanka, a bandolier belt across his chest, a brown glove and a steel gauntlet for his trigger hand. Moelock's sibe burns have grown out into a full lumberjack like beard. and his paled eye is covered by red bandages. rifle Has been changed to an old fashioned bolt action rifle which have the words "Kills traitors" scratch onto it. Talos has been traded in for a black German Shepard, with a ammunition vest .

(References: Uniform- https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/1f/01/30/1f01301f1c90d9d8dc1e0fee07d44443.jpg , Ushanka- , Talos- )

Sorry for the long comment, Feel free to give honest opinions. Cheers

Usually i do not read through all of these types of posts. but man this would be a great character to introduce and if miss fortune can support why not make a ranged marksmen like support!! BUMP although i dont agree with the abilitys the kit is far to broken to introduce. BUT GREAT WORK

yeah I mean a 4s supress on his q... I mean even malzahar and warwick have to stick that on their ult, and warwick's is a skillshot. Then you have the choice of free cleanses for your team with his first w, which is completely broken. Or a ranged, and much safer galio ult on his w, granted without the same levels of damage but 8s more than over compensates this, making this a stronger version of galio ult... on a basic ability. E is a thresh lantern combined with kayle ult. Two signature abilities, both being abilities that had shifted alot of their respective champions power allowance into their utility, and again, an ultimate... on a basic ability. 

And then we have his ult, which is probably the least stupidly overpowered ability that was put into his kit, but still being equivalent to a sion or kled ult, albiet with a fairly long cast time, but compensated with not being at all single target and a dumb 8s stun. 8s is not a reasonable number. Also let's not forget his passive, which gives his autos a slow, which doesn't sound too impactful until you realise the only other auto attack slow passive on an adc, ashe's frost shot consumed a large portion of her kit's power, with the rest going into her q and ult, but the passive slow is incredibely passive. Also the other option is a 3hit braum passive, instead of a 4hit one.

Why can't anybody ever give a fanmade champion concept, a semi-balanced, or even slightly underpowered kit. Why does it always have to be so overpowered. Looking at overloaded, overpowered kits and imagining them in the game isn't fun. Also the kit doesn't have syndergy with itself, like his ultimate is a very upclose and personal kind of thing, suggesting tanky ad sup, but his q, w and e suggest backline ranged poke sup, whereas his passive suggests short range graves type of champion. It's not consistent.
